name: flightstack
description: A collection of apps for monitoring ADS-B air traffic

variables.name: WEB_PORT
variables.description: Port to run the web service on

variables.name: SBS1_OUT_PORT
variables.description: Port to output SBS1 stream. Usually the deafult is fine.

variables.name: BEAST_OUT_PORT
variables.description: Port to output BEAST stream. Usually the deafult is fine.

variables.name: FLIGHTAWARE_FEEDER_ID
variables.description: Your site's FlightAware feeder ID; leave blank to disable feeding to Flightaware.

variables.name: FLIGHTRADAR24_KEY
variables.description: Your site's Flightradar24 key; leave blank to disable feeding to Flightradar24.

variables.name: ADSBEXCHANGE_KEY
variables.description: Your site's Adsbexchange key; leave blank to disable feeding to Adsbexchange.
